overview.summary: Scale the anisotropic component of the tensors. This maintains the isotropic component of the tensor, and fixes either the trace or determinant, while scaling up (or down) the deviatoric component of the tensor. Good for exaggerating the shape of nearly isotropic tensors.

description.p: Scale the anisotropic component of the tensors. This maintains the isotropic component of the tensor, and fixes either the trace or determinant, while scaling up (or down) the deviatoric component of the tensor. Good for exaggerating the shape of nearly isotropic tensors.
Scale: Amount by which to scale deviatoric component of tensor. This value should be a float.
